/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, is flanked by lush greenery and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A red car, vibrant against the muted colors of the surroundings, is captured in motion on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the urban landscape below. The image is taken from a low angle, offering a unique perspective that emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
